notFound.description: Looks like the page you are looking is missing

welcome.firstPart: Hack the TON is a TON based wargame inspired by
welcome.secondPart: , played in the TON Virtual Machine. Each level is a smart contract that needs to be hacked. Our goal is to help you to learn how to develop safe TON smart contracts and build a thriving community around this craft.
